## ğŸ¬ How to Use Start a Byte 

ğŸ“¸ Open the quick capture bar

ğŸ–±ï¸â–¶ï¸ Click the recording option to begin setting up your screen capture.

ğŸ–¥ï¸ğŸªŸğŸ“‘ **Choose what to record:**

ğŸ–¥ï¸ Entire screen

ğŸªŸ Specific window

ğŸ“‘ Selected tab

ğŸ”´â–¶ï¸ Confirm and start recording ğŸ‘‰ Walk through your steps, show the issue, or explain your workflow.


â¹ï¸ Press the stop button when youâ€™re finished recording.

ğŸ“‚âš¡ The recording is instantly saved to your library as a Byte.

ğŸ‘€âœï¸ğŸ’¬ Preview, annotate, add notes, or share the Byte with your team.

### ğŸ’¡ Tips

* Choose between full-screen or window recording. You can also include your voice or webcam for clearer communication.

* Use screen recording when a static image canâ€™t explain a process clearly.

* Keep your Byte short (under 2 minutes) for easier sharing and feedback.

* Record only the window you need to keep the focus clean.

* After recording, check the preview before sharing to make sure everything is visible.
